title: Floral Designer to the Stars Eric Buterbaugh Brings His Signature Flower Power to WorkshopsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Floral Designer to the Stars Eric Buterbaugh Brings His Signature Flower Power to Workshops Published on : Saturday, August 8, 2015
For the first time ever, Hollywood’s most sought after celebrity florist will host quarterly workshops on creating arrangements that make a statement.
Dubbed “The King of Roses” by Harper’s Bazaar, Resident Floral Designer Eric Buterbaugh will host arrangement workshops, lending his legendary expertise to the public and guests of Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills for the first time. The inaugural event will be offered on Tuesday, October 6, 2015 from 11:00 am to 12:30 pm in the Hotel’s Wetherly Room.
Eric Buterbaugh will speak about his fascinating path to floral design, stemming from his background in the fashion industry. He will then demonstrate how to make artistic fall and holiday-inspired arrangements, and work with each participant to create their own bouquet to take home. Attendees will also enjoy light appetisers from Four Seasons Executive Chef Cyrille Pannier, Mimosas and other refreshments.
“We are delighted to offer this unique, exclusive experience for the first time, where guests and locals have the opportunity to learn how to make floral designs from Eric Buterbaugh directly,” says General Manager Michael Newcombe.
Eric Buterbaugh is a world-renowned floral designer to the stars with more than 16 years of experience in the business of opulent flower design. Eric earned a name for himself in the fashion industry by running the Versace London office. After leaving the industry in 1998 to settle in Los Angeles, Eric first established himself as a floral mastermind when he offered to design an impromptu, extraordinary arrangement for a friend’s birthday party and from there a legend was born.
Since opening Eric Buterbaugh Flower Design in residence at Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills, notable celebrities, society figures, charitable organisations, political leaders and fashion houses have come to depend on him for his impeccable attention to detail and true appreciation for beauty and elegance. His creations have become the standard for the entire industry and he boasts a star-studded client list including Gwyneth Paltrow, Nicole Richie, Demi Moore, Tory Burch, Michael Kors, Madonna, Dior, Valentino, Ferragamo, Cartier, the British Royal Family and Salma Hayek.
Source:-Four Seasons Hotel
